question.text: Name
Age
Birth place
What is your sex
Highest level of education
Current health conditions and medical ailments
During the past 12 months, what was the most serious injury or illness that you’ve had?
During the past 12 months, what were you doing when the most serious injury happened to you?
During the past 12 months did you have the opportunity to see a doctor?
Are your parents still alive? If no, do you know the cause of death?
Any family history with illnesses or diseases such as diabetes, cancer, high blood pressure?
Do you feel that stress, anxiety, or depression have negatively impacted your quality of life in the last year?
Do you take any medications (including herbal supplements, vitamins, birth control)?
Do you notice any significant changes in your health since the 2015 earthquake?
Did or do you currently experience earthquake related stress - managing shelter, food, family, etc.
What health-related resources would be beneficial for you and your family immediately after an earthquake or flood?
What are the first resources that run out during/post floods and earthquakes?
What do you make sure to keep at all times when natural disasters strike?
Are you aware of any particular pattern to when resources are limited in relation to natural disasters, for example seasonal flooding
Are you sexually active?
What methods of birth control are available to you?

The last time you had sexual intercourse, did you or your partner use a condom or other method of birth control, such as withdrawal, rhythm (safe time), birth control pills, or any other method to prevent pregnancy?
If you wanted to get a condom, how would you most likely get it? Is it easy or difficult to get one?
How often do you or your partner use a condom when you have sexual intercourse?
Do you have any children, if so how many or are you planning to have children in the near future?
(if yes) do you plan (or did you) give birth at home or at a hospital? Why?
How old were you when you had sexual intercourse for the first time?
During your life, with how many people have you had sexual intercourse?
Have you ever been screened for a sexually transmitted diseases or HIV/AIDS?
What is your current relationship status.
What factors determined that you were ready to be a parent? Ex: financial assistance
What is the main reason you have not had sexual intercourse?
Are you generally aware of the prospect of marriage, arranged vs unarranged marriage?
Are you aware/have some understanding of birth control?
In school, were you taught in any of your classes how to avoid HIV infection or AIDS?
Have you gotten any vaccinations in the past?
If yes, then what kinds of vaccinations have you received?
Have members of your family received vaccinations?
In the next 12 months, do you plan on getting any vaccinations for yourself or have someone you know get one?
Has any health care professional ever explained vaccinations to you or your family members?
Do you know what age generally should kids get vaccinated?
Are vaccinations easily available to you and your family?
Do you drink alcohol?
When was the first time you did either or both? First time smoking a cigarette?
Have you ever taken medication that was not prescribed to you?
Have you ever overused or misused prescription drugs?
In the last month how many times have you drank or abused drugs?
How many occasions have you taken alcohol to the point you were drunk?
Have you tried to quit alcohol use? If so, did you have the necessary support?
During the past 30 days, on the days you drank alcohol, how many drinks did you usually drink per day?
During the past 30 days, how did you usually get the alcohol you drank?
During your life, how many times have you got into trouble with your family or friends, missed school, or got into fights, as a result of drinking alcohol?
What type of alcohol do you usually drink?
With whom do you usually drink alcohol?
Does your family know that you drink alcohol?
Has anyone ever explained to you the potential harms of drinking alcohol or drug abuse?
During your life, how many times have you used a needle to inject any illegal drug into your body?
Do you ever share or reuse these needles?
When did you start injecting drugs?
During the past 30 days, on how many days did you smoke cigarettes?
During the past 30 days, on how many days did you use any tobacco products other than cigarettes, such as chewing tobacco?
During the past 12 months, have you ever tried to stop smoking cigarettes?
During the past 7 days, on how many days have people smoked in your presence?
Do or did you guardians or parents smoke, if so which ones?
At any time during the next 12 months, do you anticipate that you may smoke a cigarette?
If one of your best friends offered you a cigarette, would you smoke it?
Are you aware of how many drinks a week can be a detriment to your health?
Have there ever been birth or conception complications in your family or marriage?
Have you ever felt pressured to drink alcohol, smoke, or take drugs?
What is your opinion on those who drink alcohol? Smoke? Take drugs?
Do you know about the types of drugs that are harmful to your health?
Do you associate with/hang out/live with anyone who abuses drugs?
What do you eat on a usual day? How many meals do you eat per day?
Does your daily diet include vegetables and fruit?
Does your diet/plate match this food plate? (show food plate in visual aids folder)
What kinds of foods would you like to eat/prepare?
What are some limitations for you to get healthy foods?
What do you consider the most important item within your meals?
During the past 30 days, how many times per day did you usually eat fruit, such as such as apples, oranges, mangoes, or papayas?
During the past 30 days, how many times per day did you usually eat vegetables, such as cauliflower, or cabbages?
During the past 30 days, how many times per day did you usually eat foods high in fat, such as ghee, fried food, ice cream, or cream doughnuts?
In school, were you taught in any of your classes the benefits of eating more fruits and vegetables?
Have you gained or lost a notable amount of weight within the last year without trying to?
How much water do you drink on a daily basis?
How do you get your water?
Any exercising or activities involved? If so, how often?
During the past 7 days, on how many days were you physically active for a total of at least 60 minutes per day?
During the past 7 days, on how many days did you walk or ride a bicycle to or from school?
During the past 30 days, how many times per day did you usually clean or brush your teeth?
During the past 12 months, how often did you have a tooth ache or feel discomfort because of your teeth?
In school, were you taught in any of your classes the importance of cleaning or brushing your teeth?
How often do you wash your hands before eating?
How often did you wash your hands after using the toilet or latrine?
How often do you use soap when washing your hands?
In school, were you taught in any of your classes the importance of hand washing?
Do you have a toilet or latrine at home?
What types of products are available during menstruation?
Are these products affordable and easy to acquire?
Are you interested in other options during your period?
Would you be comfortable trying more invasive products such as tampons?
How do you currently manage your period (how do you clean cloth, how often do you change cloth, etc)?
At what age did your menstruation begin?
Do you still menstruate, if so what times of the month?
Do your monthly menstruations occur regularly every month?
How many days does your period last?
How painful are your periods?
Do you experience any irregularities or complications during your period?
Have you noticed mood changes during your periods?
Do you ever need to miss school or work because of your period?
At what age did your menstruation stop?
If you wanted to get a condom or any type of birth control, how would you most likely get it?
How difficult is it for you to attain a condom or any birth control?
Did you go for a check-up before the birth?
Did you take any prenatal vitamins?
Have you ever had a miscarriage?
Do you think you know what may have caused the miscarriage?
Have you ever been to an obstetrician, gynecologist, or midwife?
How often do you consult a witch doctor?
What kind of health issues do you consult a witch doctor for?
Are you aware of the PAP test or why people take the mammogram test?
Have you ever gotten a mammogram?
Do you examine your breasts for unusual occurrences?
Have you ever gotten your breasts checked by a healthcare professional?
Has a health care professional ever explained to you how to check your breasts or the importance of checking?
Have you ever gotten a UTI or yeast infection; how many times?
The following questions are about self-defense and domestic violence. Would you like to opt-out of these questions?
During the past 12 months, how many times were you physically attacked?
Have you ever been forced to have sexual intercourse when you did not want to?
During the past 30 days, on how many days did you not go to school/work because you felt you would be unsafe at school/work OR on your way to or from school?
The following questions are about self-defense and domestic violence. Would you like to opt-out of these questions?
Are you interested in learning how to defend yourself in case of attack?
Do you believe women are unfairly treated? Do you believe women are expected to complete “womanly” and feminine tasks?
Are you familiar with the definition of assault, rape, and domestic violence?
Have you been involved in or been a victim of domestic violence or assault in the past?
If you have been assaulted, have you shared your story with anybody? Would you ever seek counseling or to talk with a friend? Why or why not?
What major traumas have you been through?
Do you have any known triggers (someone touches your throat/neck or raises their voice) that cause you to feel uneasy/uncomfortable?
Do you feel comfortable being friendly with… a. Men b. Women
Are you interested at all in learning self-defense? (defending choke/defending against knife/defending multiple attacks)
Has another person shared their personal story to you about their attack or assault or preventative measures taken to avoid a bad situation?
How often do you find yourself getting sick?
What type of symptoms have you been faced with while ill?
Do you notify your parents when you fall ill?
What type of remedies do you have in order to feel better?
What are your dreams and aspirations?
Do you currently attend school?
If you do go to school, what is the most important reason you go?
How are your school teachers and principals?
Are you ever pressured to stop attending school and begin working financially assist your family?
Do you feel safe at home and school?
Do you feel that you are limited by your resources?
How often do you brush your teeth?
Do you wash your hands before every meal?
Have you ever played with wild animals? Have you ever been bitten by one?
When are you ever hungry throughout the day and why?
Do you feel safe playing here? If not, what would make you feel safer?
What do you do during and right after earthquakes?
Do you know about earthquake preparedness?
Have you ever been bullied?
Do you have a favorite parent, if so why are they your favorite?
Who is/are your favorite person/s, and why are they your favorite person/s?
